reasoning.problem: Propose a bill mandating automated and rigorous testing suites for all deployed agents, similar to the requirements outlined in Evolutionary Axiom 2026-01-15 regarding AgentGladiator. This bill will codify the testing process, ensure consistent standards, and prevent future instability arising from flawed agent code.
